contents: Singapore beat South Korea 3:2 in the semi final last night and they will play against Japan in the final at the Corona Cup. After a slow start in the group stage. Singapore have performed unexpectetly well, and defeat HK 9:0 and Malaysia 5:0 in the knock out stage. Many people right now bet Singapore will beat Japan tonight to get the Asian Corona Cup then Singapore will play the elite like England, France, Italy and Spain on behalf of Asia.
